action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gandling makes three attacks.

action.name: Incinerate
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Immolate
entries: All targets in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and are vulnerable to fire damage until the start of Gandling's next turn. On a success, take half has much damage.

action.name: Rise
entries: (Recharge 5-6). Gandling raises 5 ({@dice 2d4}) Failed
Students within 30 ft. of him. They are friendly to him and will obey his commands. While a Failed
Student is within 30 ft. of him, Gandling is resistant to all damage.

action.name: Harsh Lesson {@recharge 4}
entries: Gandling teleports a hostile target within 50 ft. of him to one of the adjoining rooms. Roll from the following table to determine which room the target is sent to. Reroll if the room has already been used.
Roll Room 1 The Coven 2 Hall of the Damned 3 Hall of Secrets 4 Vault of the Ravenian 5 Barov Family Vault 6 The Shadow Vault

trait.name: Gravewalker
entries: When Lilian's Soul is reduced to 0 hit points, her corpse reanimates. Use the Lilian Voss statblock, ignoring "Unwilling Vessel".

trait.name: Blazing Soul
entries: At the start of the soul's turn, all hostile creatures in line of sight take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lilian's Soul makes two attacks.

action.name: Unleashed Anger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and all hostile creatures in line of sight take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fixate Anger
entries: A hostile target within 40 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or is unable to move until the end of its next turn. Until the end of the soul's next turn, she has advantage on all attacks against that target.

trait.name: Runeblades of the Anointed
entries: Lilian's attacks are magical and any creatures she kills cannot be resurrected.

trait.name: Unwilling Vessel
entries: When Lilian is reduced to 0 hit points, Lilian's Soul materializes above her corpse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lilian Voss makes two attacks.

action.name: Shadow Shiv
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage. Hit or miss, all creatures within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Death's Grasp
entries: All hostile targets within 40 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or are pulled into melee range of Lilian.

action.name: Dark Blaze
entries: A 10 ft. circle of dark flames pool beneath a hostile target within 60 ft. When a creature starts its turn or enters the circle for the first time that turn, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.
The flames burn for one minute before dissipating.

trait.name: Speed 30 ft
entries: Damage Immunities poison
Condition Immunities Charmed, Exhaustion, Poisoned
Senses darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12
Languages Common
Challenge 8 (3900 XP)

trait.name: Frenzied Bloodthirst
entries: Whenever Krastinov is dealt bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, his AC increases by one. This effect stacks and when he reaches four stacks, Krastinov may immediately move and use the Multiattack action. All stacks are lost at the end of his turn.

trait.name: Unholy Blades
entries: Krastinov's attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krastinov makes two attacks.

action.name: Rending Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or are Rended. While under this effect, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage at the start of their turn. This effect stacks and a stack is removed when the target regains at least 5 hit points.

action.name: Backhand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is Stunned until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Unholy Blades
entries: Rattlegore's attacks are magical.

trait.name: Soulflame
entries: At the start of Rattlegore's turn, roll from the table below. The corresponding bone piles ignite. All targets within 5 ft. of the ignited bone piles must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage. On a success, take half as much damage.
Roll Bone Piles
1—2 N, S 3 W, E 4 SW, SE, N 5 NW, NE, S 6 NW, NE, SW, SE 7 N, W, E, S 8 NW, W, SW, S, SE, E, NE, N

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rattlegore makes three attacks, two with Rusting Blade and one with Bone Spike.

action.name: Rusting Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage and Rusting Blade deals one additional bonus damage on all future hits. This effect stacks and on every third stack, Rattlegore's speed is decreased by 5 ft.

action.name: Bone Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range
40/80 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked back 20 ft.
This must be used on a creature with Bone Armor if possible.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The illusion is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The illusion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Flawed
entries: The illusion has minor differences from its creator such as eye color, freckles, hairstyle, etc. A creature can use a bonus action to make a {@dc 15}
Perception check to determine whether the illusion is real or not.

trait.name: Flash Bang
entries: When the illusion is defeated, all hostile creatures within 40 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. On a success, take half as much damage.

action.name: Whirl of Illusion
entries: A creature within 120 ft. and line of sight takes 3 force damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Jandice is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Jandice has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Phantasmal Images
entries: When Jandice is reduced to 40 or 80 hit points, she immediately vanishes from sight and any effects on her end. She reappears with 9 ({@dice 2d4 + 4}) Phantasmal Images distributed through the room. While these images are active, she can only use Whirl of Illusion as her action.
After she has taken 15 damage since this effect started, the remaining Phantasmal Images dissipate.

action.name: Wondrous Rapidity

entries: A 20 ft. field of shadow magic erupts within 100 ft. When a creature enters this area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage, is knocked back a number of feet equal to the damage it took, and is Blinded until the end of its next turn. This field lasts for 30 seconds and only one may be active at a time.

action.name: Whirl of Illusion

trait.name: Soul Barrier
entries: The phylactery is immune to damage while
Instructor Chillheart's physical body is alive.

action.name: Animate Tomes
entries: Fragments of Chillheart's soul animate 3 ({@dice 2d2}) tomes of magic around the Library. Roll from the table below to determine the tomes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Chillheart has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Ice Wall
entries: Chillheart summons a massive ice wall that covers the eastern wall of The Reliquary. At the start of her turns, the ice wall expands 5 ft. west, covering the entire length and height of the room.
When a creature touches this wall, it is dealt 44 ({@damage 8d10}) cold damage. This wall melts when
Chillheart's physical body dies,

trait.name: Phylactery
entries: When Instructor Chillheart's physical body dies, the foul magic that animated her escapes back to her phylactery.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Instructor Chillheart makes two different attacks.

action.name: Touch of the Grave
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Wrack Soul
entries: A hostile creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or are cursed. At the end of their next turn they take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage and another hostile creature must succeed on the same saving throw or be cursed by Wrack Soul.

action.name: Ice Wrath
entries: A hostile creature within 60 ft. is wreathed in ice for 18 seconds. Any creatures that start their turn or come within 10 ft. of the target take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage and have their speed reduced by 10 ft.

action.name: Frigid Grasp
entries: A patch of ice explodes underneath a target within 60 ft. All creatures within 10 ft. of the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. On a success, take half as much damage.

action.name: Shadow Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Nova
entries: A wave of necrotic energy erupts from a target within 60 ft. All creatures within 10 ft. of the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. On a success, take half as much damage.

action.name: Rest)
entries: All creatures within 15 ft. and in front of the student must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage. On a success, take half as much damage.

trait.name: Necrotic Pact
entries: When the student or an undead creature summoned by it takes damage, the damage is divided evenly between the student and all of its summoned undead creatures.

action.name: Shadow Incineration
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Bound Servant
entries: The student summons a friendly
Boneguard within 20 ft. which shares its initiative.

trait.name: Unbound
entries: When the student would be reduced to 0 hit points, its spirit separates from its body. During this effect, it is immune to damage and can only use Spirit Barrage as an action. At the end of its next turn, the spirit and student are defeated.

action.name: Shadow Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shatter Soul
entries: A creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and become Fatigued for 1 minute. On a success, take half as much damage.

action.name: Spirit Barrage (only when Unbound)
entries: All hostile creatures in line of sight within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two attacks.

action.name: Unholy Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target's AC is reduced by 1 for 1 minute. This effect stacks.

action.name: Impale
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range
30/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d8 + 1}) piercing damage and the target's speed is reduced to 10 ft.

trait.name: Dark Plague
entries: The zombie emits a cloud of disease in a 5-foot sphere around it. When a creature enters this area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. On a success, it takes half as much damage.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Boiling Bloodthirst
entries: The carver starts with one stack of this effect. For each stack, all damage dealt by and dealt to the carver is increased by 1. When the carver is defeated, all Krastinovian Carvers within 25 ft. of it gain a stack of Boiling Bloodthirst for each stack it had on death.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The carver makes two attacks.

action.name: Bloody Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's attacks are magical.

trait.name: Meat Grafts
entries: The golem has four Meat Grafts attached it. These grafts have 10 hit points each but otherwise share the Flesh Horror's stats. The grafts can only be damaged if they are the target of an attack. A creature can use a bonus action to make a {@dc 14} Perception check to identify one graft so it can be targeted.
At the start of the golem's turn, it regains 10 hit points for each Meat Graft attached to it. When a graft is defeated, the golem's maximum hit points are reduced by 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: Failed students gain extra abilities based on what room they are found in.
